The artist is obviously exploring issues with his childhood. [#Legal]
De toute évidence, l'artiste utilise l'art pour exorciser ses démons.[#Legal]
Der Künstler verarbeitet offensichtlich Kindheitserlebnisse. [#Legal]
L'artista sta chiaramente cercando di estroflettere i sopiti lati oscuri della propria infanzia. [#Legal]
Claramente, el artista exploraba problemas de su infancia. [#Legal]
The artist is obviously exploring issues with his childhood. [#Legal]
